website_summaries.verdict: Two-way translator for 70 languages with high level of accuracy to adequately tackle longer sentences at a time. Moderately priced.
pros: Independent unit with 2.4” HD screen that displays translation and lets you navigate features
Comes with a lanyard for easy access, and it’s light enough to wear around your neck
Has a one-year warranty and guarantee with easy-to-reach customer service
cons: Requires WiFi to work, which could be problematic if you’re in a dead zone or can’t connect to a network

customer_reviews.title: I glad to have it!
customer_reviews.text: I glad to have it! I already tested with Spanish, English , Ukrainian, and Russian languages. Works great! The accuracy was 99%. It much better than I expected. The size is very delicated and can be easily placed in the pocket. Hope this translator would be very helpful for my parent during traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Winter time

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this voice translator! Just got back from France and saw this on amazon. I know we can get the phone app for free translations but this one is so much easier to use. I actually got this for my 12 years old. We are planning to visit new country every year for vacation. also it is a great tool for his new French class that’s coming up!
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: REALLY?! Do not buy this thing
customer_reviews.text: What a stupid device/idea. If I wanted to use a translator Over wifi I can use my phone, this device DOES NOT WORK WITHOUT WIFI SO WHATS THE DEAL HERE??? 170 bucks for a device that connects to internet to translate?? Do not buy this thing your smart phone connects to wifi and does the same save that money on something else
customer_reviews.author: oscarjavieros

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: If only I could give this ZERO stars...I recently went to Japan and it was the absolute worst product in history- next to the worthless GPS tracker I bought for my 7 year old. I tested this product out before I left the US and it worked “okay”, but when I got to Japan- a total NIGHTMARE. It never worked! At one point I tried to tell the cab driver that it was a beautiful day and it translated, “We are going to die”... I was mortified. That is just a taste of the stuff it translated. It NEVER once worked. Save your money and download an app! It is JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to translate even with short phrases or simple words. Battery life is horrible. Dies super fast. Barely get an hour of use. Do not buy. Was a waste of time. Had better luck using google translate and works so much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Wired wrong???
customer_reviews.text: My translator doesn’t work well. I’ve tried to use it with my foreign exchange student but it doesn’t work like it’s supposed to. You press one button and it does a different function, it seems as though there are crossed wires. I read the instructions and followed step by step instructions and it just doesn’t work correctly. My friend also tried it ans agrees that there’s something wired improperly. I wish that I could get a different translator because this one isn’t working out for me.
customer_reviews.author: TweezzAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would feel confident using it on vacation
customer_reviews.text: Quite good. Tried languages that my colleagues speak. Did a good job with German, Romanian, French and Mandarin. Had trouble with one French phrase that involved math but my French colleague mumbles a lot, so maybe it was his fault. Really like it and plan to take it along on vacation. It's as small as a phone (narrower but a bit thicker), so it would be easy to bring along. Very easy to use without reading instructions, but the hints help.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hoogland

customer_reviews.title: Better than a phone app
customer_reviews.text: Bought it one weeks, I find this translator to be better than comparable phone applications and is very easy to use. It is not 100% accurate but overall, is comprehensive and impressive. A solid Wi-Fi connection speed (hotspot) and clear speech is essential to get the most out of this device. Its small, portable, and will make travel-life easier.
customer_reviews.author: queenie

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Birgus device. Bought to use for a week-long family trip to Southern California. We spent over half our trip at Disneyland and Universal Studios using the apps for each theme park to maximize our fun and taking lots of a pictures, also used it for asking directions. It’s been all over the world, in a number of climates, temperatures, pressures, etc, and has held up brilliantly. Good build quality and very reliable. Too many language. You will need to connect wifi in order to make it work. The sound is really clear and loud. Touch screen is working good. Material doesnt look cheap. It come with usb charger. It fit for travel.
customer_reviews.author: sam G

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient tool
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this! Just received this. Took a bit to figure out the best way to use it. But, I did it. In the right setting. I can have an actual two way conversation with someone who speaks spanish, russian, chinese. vietnamese, and many more. That is an amazing tool , super convenient !I will bring it with me whenever i travel.It's also great when learning a new language ! It's simple and intuitive, with decent information on word synonyms and stuff. Haven't had any problems so far (about two weeks). And it’s a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: KENNY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: After actually using this product its delayed, clucky to use on the go and temperamental. I tried it with a few people in the office that spoke other languages. Before traveling with it. Noticed some issues in translation there and back and forth communication. It was even worse when used out of the country. There are way better products out there with much better performance and price.
customer_reviews.author: Garron Richardson

customer_reviews.title: A must for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I love traveling to different countries, but sometimes communication is tough. This small device is very useful when I travel aboard. It is very easy to use, I learned how to use it within 15 min, and the translation accuracy is very high, as people seem to understand my questions very easily, and this is definitely a great way to get around in a foreign country. It is kind of pricey, but considering how helpful this is, this is a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. so easy to set up and operate. This voice translator very small and I'd take it with me all the time. I have to communicate with people only speak Chinese. This translator works great and I don't worry about how to communicate with them. It has the two-way translation in 70 languages, it can translate when you speak slowly and loudly. This translator is perfect for someone needs to travel to a different country. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful translator device. It is very easy to setup, and very easy to use. First you need to make it connect to wifi or hotdest. Then you can use the device to transfer to language. The device translation is very fast and accurate. I'm working for a nail salon. Now I can talk to the customers without being afraid and shy of having language barrier. And you don't need worry about the language if go to many countries for vacation . Because this device can translation for 70 kinds of language. I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful voice translater
customer_reviews.text: I work for a international trade company, so i have to communicate with a lot of agent from different country, this voice translater help me a lot to contact the agent, fast translate reaction, just set the language you want to translate, connect to wifi,press the button, then there are no misunderstood from both side, this really saving my job
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The translate is very fast when operating, also the manual is clear and software easy to use. It is light weight and multi functional translator, with long battery time. It uses WI-FI which means you have to open your mobile phone hotspot when going outside.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Too Difficult to understand
customer_reviews.text: The product is difficult to understand and requires a wifi source.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy It ! ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: It stopped recharging after the first use which was at the 90 day's post-purchase mark, very cheap and lightweight, the changing plug receptacle was never "snug:". Waste of $175.00
customer_reviews.author: david b.

customer_reviews.title: Better than google translate.
customer_reviews.text: It can translate pretty fast and accurate. We tried at least 5 languages to English, it did a pretty good job. But keep in mind it need WiFi to work ALL the time. So if you plan to bring it outside with you, you’ll probably need your phone to set up a hotspot for it to use.
customer_reviews.author: walter white

customer_reviews.title: An expensive joke
customer_reviews.text: I will not recommend for anyone to buy this product. I tried using my language to translate it to French. So the way it translated was to use my language but talked in a French accent. This would be very funny if it were a joke. Why it gets four and a half stars rating should be suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto G. Sanidad

customer_reviews.title: WiFi needed or it will NOT work!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, pretty accurate, although may have to repeat what you want to translate. And needs WiFi or will not work. The WiFi part was disappointing since not every country has WiFi readily available and not everyone has hotspot on their phones. Unless WiFi is available the translator WILL NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Gtz

customer_reviews.title: Great tool and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it says. Was able to use it multiple times with various languages. Everyone I showed it to was amazed. Purchased (2) of them one for me and one for my wife who is learning Nepalese. The 70 languages are great. Are more coming soon? Only suggestion is I wish they had a way to add some often used languages to a 'Favorites" list. Also an earphone port would be nice so that I could use it to listen only and also speak it myself if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this device!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this device, you will be very disappointed. First unit quit connecting to the network although the settings said connected, when you spoke it said not connected. After numerous frustration with the manufacturer, they finally sent a replacement that quit working after just a few weeks. Still struggling to get a refund or replacement. I won't give up hounding them about such poor product and very difficult customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This thing only works every once in a while and never when I need it to. The return policy is a joke, their customer service is responsive but cheap skates. This thing also is lightweight and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use, and It work!
customer_reviews.text: The translator device build quality is very solid, and it's work extremely easy, just hold on the button, and speak and it will translator the word or whole sentence to whatever language you need. I really like this design and tested it many times, with an accuracy rate of over 90%, I will use it to travel to Europe. After using this time, the battery is more durable than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: BING

customer_reviews.title: It make my husband ‘s life much easier
customer_reviews.text: this translator is a gift for my husband. His career need to deal with the client from all different countries. He had tried with serval his client and he really satisfied with the translation.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy cody

customer_reviews.title: five stars
customer_reviews.text: The translator is simple and light weight, Different language exchange setting are simple.It also has two charging line . Which are very convenient to use voice input translation.In the place where I work , some customers do not speak English , It can be used to make me communicate better with customers.I used it as soon as I received it , it was really helpful .I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. so easy to set up and operate. This voice translator very small and I'd take it with me all the time. I have to communicate with people only speak Chinese.This translator works great and I don't worry about how to communicate with them. It has the two-way translation in 52 languages, it can translate when you speak slowly and loudly. This translator is perfect for someone needs to travel to a different country. Love it! Read less
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Wont work! Update feature not available.
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DON'T PURCHASE THIS TRANSLATOR!!!!! I spent my money on this product and it works but because there is no update feature, the translator stopped translating into the other language on both ends. I call amazon for help but my return window closed. I contact the seller and no reply. Dont buy this product please learn from my experience!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The device works well. The only downside is the requirement of wi-fi to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Taka

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Get prepare for Spain and Japan trips. According to my Mexican and Japanese friends this thing works accurate but you have to speak authentic language grammar. Super lightweight and very easy to operate. The only thing that I worried about is that I can not get the WiFi at the local area. One more thing, great seller and great communicated with!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one month. Will try a different model next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio R.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to remind easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this translator device for the main purpose of better communicating with my son’s classmates’ parents. I really enjoy the convenience over google translator;I just have to press a button instead of “search “. I truly recommend this to anyone who may be experiencing any language barriers.Now,I’m able to communicate with many other individuals who don’t speak English.It’s made my life a lot easier and widen my circle of friends!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This one is very good for my journey, sometimes I don't understand what the locals say when i go travel, so I used this translation, then I can communicate with them. The sound could just come out from the translator, so we can understand each other. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: xue liu

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use translator
customer_reviews.text: Excellent neat little translator. Makes tranlating a breeze. Needs wifi connectivity but all around an easy to use device. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe1975

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. I am so upset that I missed my return window, because we purchased this so far in advance before attempting to use it. GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device for my parents who do not speak English well and they have been using it for a long time and love it, this device is easy to use and noting to install, you just need to connect to the internet and it weill work, the whole translation process is quick. The speaker is loud and clear. It is small and good for travelling, battery last adequately long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a major disappointment to me when it came to its actual and practical use - very ineffective as well as a defective charging connection!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Just wanted to return it
customer_reviews.text: I could not understand how to use it and asked to return it. But they haven't responded after my first conversation
customer_reviews.author: chris rowe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Things have been received, I don’t have English in this translator, I can travel everywhere, it’s also very convenient to use. The most important voice recognition ability is strong, so I recommend a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: junji zhang

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe they have the nerve to charge 150.00+
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews mislead me as to the quality of the product. It's very cheaply made. It worked for five minutes and quit. Don't waste your time and money. It also gives different options for dialects of Spanish but translates them all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Useful device
customer_reviews.text: I brought for my parents in law they just immigranted to US. It’s small and easy to use. my parent in law they carry in pockets all the time in case of they need it. Now they can hang out alone without my accompany.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

customer_reviews.title: A device must have for small business
customer_reviews.text: I try the app from Iphone but it does not come close to this device. You must have WIFY to operate. I wish the battery last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: translator
customer_reviews.text: It's a present for my mother. They like it. You can take him with you when you go shopping later. I can't say I want to buy something and I can't speak English. It's easy and convenient to operate
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Combersome on the go and doesn't work well with hotel wifi.
customer_reviews.text: Much slower than the free translator app for your phone. I found it convenient to use as a training tool for self study at home if you don't have use of a cellphone. Can work with your phone hot spot when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V Hillerman

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I bought a translation device,and it was very practical after I use it several times. I have a friend who are Mexican,this little thing just being a lot convenience on our conversation. Impressed
customer_reviews.author: JONNY ZHENG

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Ver easy to use product with only one button simplicity. I find the translations pretty accurate. Would recommend as a solid tool for traveling to countries where you don't know the language.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Won’t return email.
customer_reviews.text: The unit failed to charge after the battery ran down the first time. Amazon won’t do anything and can’t get a reply from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Connecting to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t connect to any of the WiFi , I had to returned it
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Chen

customer_reviews.title: The speaker didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The speaker didn’t work and the company didn’t answer me back
customer_reviews.author: Mohsen

customer_reviews.title: Translation is fast.
customer_reviews.text: Sound processing ability is strong, even if there is noise in the environment, it can distinguish clearly and translate accurately.Translation is fast.Batteries also last.It can translate many languages and travel is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: shaoming yu

customer_reviews.title: It works for my mom
customer_reviews.text: It works for my mom. She likes it, so I rate it 5 Stars. Touch Screen! Easy to hold and operate! Accuracy is very high! After connecting the internet with hotspot, she can use it out of our home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good portable translator on the hand, and easy to use, specially with the light weight.
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: Great translator
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, It is small, light and appears to do everything as described and its translations were clear and correct. Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: yan

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: The translation is accurate and fast. It's convenient to buy such a translator for traveling anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I brought this translator for my mother. It's easy to use and translate sentences accurately. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wan

customer_reviews.title: Would not work out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Would not work out of the box. Wrote 3 emails to the seller and no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It’s super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to use and it translates pretty fast and accurate.ALL you need is WIFI or a hotspot.Very user friendly and simple. Also a great tool when learning the selected language.Only problem is he has to use phone hotspot when going out.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: MORTENTR Translator Device Smart Voice Translator with 2.4inch HD Touch Screen Support 70 Languages for Learning Travel Business Shopping
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackInstant Voice Translator Device Translation 70 Languages Smart two-way for Travelling Abroad Learning Off-Line Shopping Business Chat Recording Translations
This Voice Translator Device covers Chinese (simplified), Cantonese, Chinese (traditional), English (United States), English (Philippines), English (Ireland), 
English (Britain), English (Canada), English (Australia), Japanese, Korean, French (France), Russian, Finnish, Spanish (International), Greece Arabic (United Arab Emirates), German (Germany), Danish, 
Spanish (Mexico), Arabic (Iraq), Nepal, etc.
User Guide:
1. When you are prompted to update the device, please upgrade it and don't perform any operations during program download.
2. Please long press the red button on the right when you are going to speak to the translator, until the recording icon show on the screen, then you can start to speak.
3. Please don't use a mantra or a local dialect as this will affect accuracy of translation.
4. Please speak in normal speed, don't speak too quickly, and do not stop in the process of speaking several times, or speak too more sentences one time. As it will affect the accuracy of translation.
5. When first time use it, if you can't power on this device, please charge it for 30 minutes, as it doesn't have power inside. Please use our charging cable to charge this device,as other cables can't charge it
6. If you already connected to WIFI, when you use the translator, it doesn't response to you, you just reboot the translator, then will be okay.
Product specification:
Product Name: Voice Translator T2
Product Size: 144*56*15mm
Weight: 95.6g 
Screen size:2.4inch
Touch screen:IPS Capacitive touch screen
Screen Resolution: 240*320
Battery capacity:1200mAh
Standby time:7 days
Long working time:10 hours
Packaging Include
1x Voice Translator 
1x USB cable 
1x English Manual
feature_bullets: 【High-Speed Translating Accuracy】The translator device is a 2-way translator with all 70 languages.This translator has ultra-high translating accuracy for complicated sentences. Large 2.4 inch color touchscreen provides easy readability for voice to text translation.you can click the screen to replay audio, Suitable face to face translation and call translation.

【2-way Voice & Versatility of Translator】 A language and B language both can change to another languages. Click the screen to choose the language pair. For example, you can choose English-Spanish, Spanish-English. Also our translator is perfect for traveling, shopping, entertainment,communicating with friends,or making new ones while learning a foreign language.

【High Recognition Ability】 The speaker voice of this translator device is loud and clear,and the mic is able to recognize your voice in noisy environments. If a sentence is too long at one time, the reaction will be a little bit slow, but as you use it more and more, it will be faster and more accurate.

【Connect to WiFi or Hotspot】 Wherever you can access the internet by wifi or Hotspot, no need to connect through an APP on your mobile phone.This functionality means that once connected you can immediately begin real-time translation. Compact and easily portable: keep on a lanyard for quick access or stow in your pocket.

【Best Warranty Method】MORTENTR voice language translator will come with a 12-month warranty guarantee.And we will provide fast and easy-to-reach Customer Service to solve your problems within 12 hours.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars161 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
